How many people are affected by Noonan syndrome ?,"Noonan syndrome occurs in approximately 1 in 1,000 to 2,500 people.",GHR,Noonan syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Noonan syndrome ?,"Mutations in the PTPN11, SOS1, RAF1, KRAS, NRAS and BRAF genes cause Noonan syndrome.  Most cases of Noonan syndrome result from mutations in one of three genes, PTPN11, SOS1, or RAF1. PTPN11 gene mutations
